name: Cement Bag
description: A 50 kg bag of Portland cement, used for making concrete and mortar.

name: Concrete Block
description: A standard 8-inch concrete block used in construction for walls and foundations.

name: Steel Rebar
description: Steel reinforcement bar used to strengthen concrete structures.

name: Wooden Beam
description: A large wooden beam, typically used for framing floors and ceilings in construction.

name: Drywall Sheet
description: A large sheet of drywall used for interior wall and ceiling construction.

name: Insulation Roll
description: Fiberglass or foam insulation material used to regulate temperature and sound in buildings.

name: Roof Shingles
description: Overlapping tiles used to cover roofs, typically made from asphalt, wood, or metal.

name: Plywood Sheet
description: A wooden panel made by gluing thin layers of wood together, used for flooring and construction.

name: Bricks
description: Standard clay or concrete bricks used for constructing walls and foundations.

name: Gravel
description: Small rocks used as a base material for roads, foundations, and drainage.

name: Sand
description: Fine-grained material used in concrete, mortar, and landscaping.

name: Paint
description: Liquid coating used for finishing and protecting surfaces, available in various types (e.g., interior, exterior).

name: PVC Pipes
description: Plastic pipes used for plumbing, electrical conduits, and drainage systems.

name: Glass Panel
description: Flat glass used for windows, facades, and other architectural purposes.

name: Metal Sheet
description: Thin sheets of metal used in roofing, cladding, and construction frames.

name: Concrete Slab
description: Large pre-cast concrete slabs used for floors, foundations, and roofing.

name: Mortar Mix
description: A mixture of cement, sand, and water used for bonding bricks and stones.

name: Lumber
description: Wood that has been processed into standard sizes, typically used for framing and construction.

name: Stone Slab
description: Large slabs of natural stone, such as granite or marble, used for countertops or flooring.

name: Tile
description: Flat pieces of ceramic, porcelain, or stone used for flooring and wall coverings.

name: Reinforced Mesh
description: A welded wire mesh used to reinforce concrete structures.
